_comment_debug: true or false - enables debug logging to files
_comment_logging: Control console output by log level: DEBUG (technical details), INFO/progress (progress updates), WARNING/warnings (potential issues), ERROR/errors (failures)
_comment_llm: llm_provider: OpenAI or ECB-LLM (U2A OAuth2 authentication only)
_comment_model: model: gpt-4o (for OpenAI) or gpt-4o, gpt-5.1 (for ECB-LLM only)
_comment_translation_mode: translation_mode: 'fast' (generate once in first language, then translate) or 'accurate' (generate fresh alt-text for each language). 'fast' is recommended for cost/speed.
_comment_html_report_display: HTML report display settings: control which fields are shown in the generated HTML report
_comment_ecb_llm: ECB-LLM U2A OAuth2 configuration: token_url, scope, authorize_url (OAuth2 authorization endpoint)
_comment_project_root: Optional: Specify custom project root directory. If not set or 'auto', automatically detects as parent of backend/ folder. Use absolute path for custom location.

download._comment: timeout: request timeout in seconds, delay_between_requests: delay between image downloads to avoid rate limiting
download.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

image_extraction._comment: Configure which HTML tags and attributes to use for finding images

context._comment: Context extraction configuration: max_text_length (max chars per text element), max_parent_levels (DOM levels to traverse), min_text_length (minimum chars to include), max_sibling_text_length (max chars from sibling elements)

prompt._comment: Prompt template configuration: files (list of prompt template files to load), merge_separator (separator between multiple prompts), default_prompt (fallback prompt file)

languages._comment: Supported languages for alt-text generation (EU official languages)
